title: Bulwark Foundation Registration
excerpt: Our foundation has been officially registered and started its activities...
content:
Official Start

The Bulwark Foundation has received legal registration. This allows us to work legally and openly cooperate with partners.

Mission

We support Belarusian volunteers in Ukraine through legal and psychological assistance, addiction recovery programs, and the creation of a volunteer hub.

This is the first step towards systematic and transparent work.

title: Domain Acquisition for the Website
excerpt: We acquired our own domain and are preparing a communication platform...
content:
Own Platform

The Bulwark Foundation has obtained its own domain, which will serve as the basis for our website.

Convenience and Transparency

The website will host news, reports, and instructions for volunteers. This is an important step in building a reliable information base.

title: Launch of Telegram Bot
excerpt: We created a Telegram bot for quick communication and support...
content:
New Tool

The Bulwark Foundation’s Telegram bot helps users receive news, find contacts, and quickly join volunteer programs.

Accessibility

The bot works around the clock and makes communication simpler and more effective.

title: Creation of Telegram Channel
excerpt: We opened an official channel for news and updates...
content:
Official Channel

The Bulwark Telegram channel has become the main point for publishing news and updates.

Community

Here we share information about new programs, reports, and volunteer opportunities. The channel unites people who want to help and stay informed.

title: Bulwark Platform Launch: A New Stage of Support
excerpt: We are officially launching a unified information resource to help Belarusian volunteers. Transparency, a knowledge base, and systematic support — now in one place.
content:
Platform Mission Features For Partners For Volunteers

Our Mission

Bulwark is a response to the demand for systematic support. We have created a platform that doesn't just collect donations but builds a bridge between those who help and those on the front lines.

Main goal: maximum efficiency of resources and legal safety of every soldier.

What does the platform offer?

  • Knowledge Base: detailed instructions on legalization in Ukraine, obtaining statuses, and documents.
  • Accountability: regular publications on the targeted use of funds.
  • Fast Communication: a direct channel for volunteer requests.

Benefits for Partners

We understand the importance of trust. Therefore, for large foundations and private philanthropists, we provide:

  • full audit of purchases;
  • photo and video confirmation of aid delivery;
  • direct communication with unit commanders.

For Volunteers

If you are a Belarusian fighting for Ukraine, Bulwark is your rear assistant. Here you will find answers to complex questions: from how to move your family to what to do in case of legal disputes with the migration service.

The site is operating in test mode. If you notice an error, please let us know via the feedback form.
